name: Shouty McGhostface
description:
Shouty McGhostface is a stealth platformer where you switch between ghost and human form to avoid security cameras, angry parents and 'Ghosthunters (TM)' to get revenge on the children that ate all the sweets from the 'Pick One' Candy Bowl.

Features of this game include:
- three whole levels (not even including the tutorial!)
- a cool story
- a variety of enemies and hazards to avoid
- cool gameplay where you switch between stealth and bullet hell as a ghost and good ol' platforming as a human.
- 45 DEGREE SLOPES                                                                                                             

This game was made for The Council of the Bros Halloween Jam, which was a jam I made that me, my friends and some other people took part in.

Thanks for checking out my game :) - kadable

Game by Kade Hennessy
Grass tileset by Rhys Hennessy
